name: Deltarune
notes: Set up Vulkan first: Click here for a how-to guide. Uses DXVK to make game run at normal speed. Press Alt+Enter for fullscreen.
content:
files:
- installer: https://fangamer-store.sfo2.digitaloceanspaces.com/SURVEY_PROGRAM_WINDOWS_ENGLISH.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/SURVEY_PROGRAM/DELTARUNE.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2015 win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- write_file:
    content: '$PLUGINSDIR

      $TEMP'
    file: $CACHE/exclude.txt
- execute:
    command: 7z x -x@"$CACHE/exclude.txt" "$CACHE/installer/SURVEY_PROGRAM_WINDOWS_ENGLISH.exe"
      -o"$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/SURVEY_PROGRAM"
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dxvk.conf
    key: dxgi.syncInterval
    section: fps-cap
    value: 2
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dxvk.conf
    key: dxgi.numBackBuffers
    section: fps-cap
    value: 4
system:
  fps_limit: '30'
wine:
  dxvk: true
